name: Aliens love cows
description:
You can only turn left or right to interact in our runner.

When you face an opponent, the screen switches to a third-person view and the battle begins.

If you don't have enough lifes to fight or energy to buy the strange technique of the aborigines off - reset to the beginning of the game.

Goal: To complete the runner, reach the end and gain as much energy as possible in one go.

You can write your best result on the energy gained in the comments!

Plot: You are glorious aliens picking cows up to survive, trying to fly around the strange houses of the aborigines, and fighting with their equipment.

How to play:

A - on the left

D - right

Authors:

Alexey Stepanenko - programmer

Alena Kharchenko - UI

Alexey Salnikov - 3D artist

Kirill Gopta - sound engineer

Sergey Fufarev - game designer
